this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - green and purple - yarn needle - scissors final size - the diameter is 8 cm and the height is 2 5 cm technical notes *at the end of each round/row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern lily pad green round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic circle make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in the first st followed by 2 double_crochet in each of the next 8 sts in the last st make 1 double_crochet 18 sts round 3 chain 2 turn make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around 27 sts *fasten_off flower purple row 1 chain 30 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 29 sts row 2 chain 1 turn make 1 slip_stitch in the first st then chain 1 make 1 double_crochet in the next st chain 1 make 1 slip_stitch in the next st repeat across 29 sts fasten_off and weave in the roll up weave sew to the lily leave a 20 cm yarn starting yarn tail the yarn needle pad tail back and forth to lock the flower in place link to video https //youtu be/v2iogobjgca if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
